comments.body: Can we simply run SHOW TABLES again here and self-join the result? Seems we don't need to create another table to trigger this bug?
This test reproduces a real use case at least, and it works already. Don't know how often people do self-join of the same `SHOW TABLES`. It seems synthetic case to me.
